author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a follow-up of and may replace https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45528.

Quoting @smuzaffar 
> Many relvals are failing for aarch64 IB due to nan being pass to std::stable_sort (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45464 ). This PR fixes few divide by 0 in DAClusterizerInZ_vect.cc to avoid generating nan.

The proposal is to check for finiteness (with `edm::isFinite` due to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45528#issuecomment-2276108018) for the denominator of a series of ratios exploding to NaN.
title: Fix NaNs From 0 Divisions in `DAClusterizerInZ_vect.cc`
